title: Tech Mahindra to create new revenue streams, 1,000 Jobs in UK - Economic Times
content:
1. Tech Mahindra to create new revenue streams, 1,000 Jobs in UK  Economic Times
  2. Tech Mahindra to Generate New Revenue Streams and 1000 Jobs in UK by Leveraging AI and Data Science  Analytics Insight
  3. Tech Mahindra to generate new revenue streams; to add 1,000 jobs in UK  BusinessLine
  4. Tech Mahindra says to create 1,000 jobs in UK  ETTelecom
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The announcement on the back of British Prime Minister Boris Johnsons visit to India to bolster the bilateral ties. The Mahindra Group company will collaborate with a research institute in the UK to co-innovate at Tech Mahindras Makers Lab in Milton Keynes, according to its statement.
